title: Floods hit South Africa’s KwaZulu-Natal province again
body: The floods come only a month after torrential rains killed 435 people in KwaZulu-Natal.

title: Mozambique: Cyclone Gombe death toll rises to 53
body: In recent years, Southern Africa has suffered repeated devastating cyclones that used to be relatively rare.

title: Mozambique announces new prime minister after cabinet reshuffle
body: New ministers were named after a major reshuffle by President Filipe Nyusi.

title: Analysis: Can African gas replace Russian supplies to Europe?
body: A lack of infrastructure, not capacity, could hurt the continent’s plan to supply gas to Europe in Russia’s stead.

title: Dozens dead from Tropical Storm Ana in southern Africa
body: At least 70 killed in storm that struck Madagascar, Mozambique and Malawi as authorities scramble to repair damages.

title: Southern Africa bloc SADC extends Mozambique mission
body: Regional body says progress made against rebels in Cabo Delgado province since troops deployed last year.

title: Climate change and famine | Start Here
body: Why people in Madagascar are starving.

title: In Mozambique, Kagame says Rwandan troops’ work not over
body: Rwandan president says his country’s force will help secure and rebuild Cabo Delgado areas destroyed by armed campaign.

title: Rwanda, Mozambique forces recapture port city from rebels
body: Mocimboa da Praia, home to one of Africa’s biggest natural gas projects, retaken from rebels, Rwandan army says.

title: Rwanda deploys 1,000 soldiers to Mozambique’s Cabo Delgado
body: Gov’t says deployment at request of Mozambican authorities aimed at restoring state control in conflict-hit province.
